publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4305 Christine Grahame: Happy 100th Birthday, West Linton Primary School—That the Parliament wishes the teachers, children and the community of West Linton a happy celebration of the 100th birthday of West Linton Primary School on 12 June 2009; notes that, in this Year of Homecoming, there are West Lintonians returning for both Whipman week, from 5 to 13 June 2009, and the centenary of the school, and wishes all West Lintonians a successful and fun week.
S3M-4305 Happy 100th Birthday, West Linton Primary School (lodged on 3 June 2009) Stuart McMillan*

S3M-4305 Christine Grahame: Happy 100th Birthday, West Linton Primary School—That the Parliament wishes the teachers, children and the community of West Linton a happy celebration of the 100th birthday of West Linton Primary School on 12 June 2009; notes that, in this Year of Homecoming, there are West Lintonians returning for both Whipman week, from 5 to 13 June 2009, and the centenary of the school, and wishes all West Lintonians a successful and fun week. Supported by: Stuart McMillan, Jamie McGrigor*, Jack McConnell*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-4305 Happy 100th Birthday, West Linton Primary School (lodged on 3 June 2009) John Lamont*, Robin Harper*
S3M-4305 Happy 100th Birthday, West Linton Primary School (lodged on 3 June 2009) Malcolm Chisholm*
S3M-4305 Happy 100th Birthday, West Linton Primary School (lodged on 3 June 2009) Gil Paterson*, Sandra White*
